message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided in the problem, I can see there is a line item labeled "Depreciation" with an amount of 100239.89 on 2024-02-01.

The depreciation amount represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives, which is exactly what the task is asking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '100239.89'} }
```
